statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';

DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND next_maintenance_date <= '2023-01-01';

DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND task_id = 2;
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 10 AND scheduled_date < '2022-01-01';
